text: Antonio Aguilar Barraza (born José Pascual Antonio Aguilar Márquez Barraza; 17 May 191919 June 2007) was a Mexican singer-songwriter, actor, equestrian, movie producer, and screenwriter. He recorded over 150 albums, which sold 25 million copies. He acted in more than 120 movies. His son, Pepe Aguilar, is a popular Mexican-American singer. Aguilar died of pneumonia on 19 June 2007 at a hospital in Mexico City, aged 88. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Mexican singer- songwriters Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican screenwriters Category:Mexican movie producers Category:Mexican equestrians
title: Antonio Aguilar
